com.skobbler.ngx.map

Class SKMapScaleView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • com.skobbler.ngx.map.SKMapScaleView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback

    public class SKMapScaleView
extends android.view.View
    SKMapView's scale view. Can be enabled to display the ratio of a distance on a map to the corresponding distance on the ground.
    Version:
    2.5
